definition: handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears

sentences.english: The Lakers also receive the Grizzlies' second-round pick in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 湖人还将接受灰熊队在2010年的第2轮选秀权。

sentences.english: To certain extent, democracy is the most obvious advantage of talent shows.
sentences.chinese: 从某种程度上说，民主性正是选秀活动好处的体现。

sentences.english: Brown was the second offensive lineman chosen in the draft.
sentences.chinese: 布朗是选秀中被选中的第二位进攻内锋。

sentences.english: We held trials every week up at Albert Park in Salford on the floodlit Astroturf.
sentences.chinese: 我们每周都在萨尔福德的阿尔伯特公园举办选秀。

sentences.english: There were questions about the drafting of Andrew Bynum and Jordan Farmar.
sentences.chinese: 在选秀选拜纳姆和砝码儿时也有争议。

sentences.english: Reality TV competition can certainly never be wonderful as super stars' concerts.
sentences.chinese: 选秀节目当然不可能像明星演唱会一样精彩。

sentences.english: He was acquired from Memphis in a draft-day trade.
sentences.chinese: 他是选秀日当天被灰熊交易到火箭的。

sentences.english: It has more Hall of Famers than any other draft class.
sentences.chinese: 它比历史上任何一届的选秀进入名人堂的都要多。

sentences.english: He is a lottery pick in the history of Illinois high school player.
sentences.chinese: 他是Illinois校史上选秀顺位最高的球员。

sentences.english: The reason lies in the populist nature of these talent shows.
sentences.chinese: 这在于选秀节目的全民性。

sentences.english: The Los Angeles Lakers have offered a future first-round pick to Minnesota for completing the transaction.
sentences.chinese: 湖人队同森林狼交易的筹码是未来的一个首轮选秀权。

sentences.english: Draft is a selecting of new players from a choice group of amateur players by professional teams.
sentences.chinese: 选秀就是职业队从业余选手中挑选新人。

sentences.english: He even cancelled his appearance at the traditional post-draft press conference.
sentences.chinese: 甚至选秀之后的例行新闻发布会都被他取消了。

sentences.english: Those who were drafted are sitting at home with no contracts and no pay.
sentences.chinese: 参加了选秀的球员们都无合同无薪水的干坐家中。

sentences.english: Yao was the first ever NBA No. 1 pick from overseas.
sentences.chinese: 姚明是NBA历史上第一位非美籍的选秀状元。

sentences.english: They also have two more first-round draft picks.
sentences.chinese: 他们也拥有了两个以上的首轮选秀权。

definition: candidate who came second in the Han-lin examination/see 狀元|状元[zhuang4 yuan2]
to sign one's name/visa/variant of 籤|签[qian1]
inscribed bamboo stick (used in divination, gambling, drawing lots etc)/small wood sliver/label/tag
to choose/to pick/to settle upon/to decide upon a candidate/to be selected for some role

top scorer in the palace examination (highest rank of the Imperial examination system)/see 榜眼[bang3 yan3] and 探花[tan4 hua1]/top scorer in college entrance examination 高考[gao1 kao3]/(fig.) the most brilliantly talented person in the field/leading light
second round (of a match or election)
